reviewText:
The DVD "Watching Me - Starring Nikki Dial" from Lou Vockell Creative Productions contains a 44 min video with Nikki Dial and a 32 min video with Jennifer entitled Pretty Pictures.

I know a lot of Lou Vockell DVDs as I like the style the US Starlets are presenting themselves in these, so I can say this one is a little bit short, but it is one of the best, especially in terms of explicitness.

Of course the videos are only single-girl and not rated, but Nikki shows all her pink assets full frontal in long and lustful sequences, in closeups and even a little bit playing with herself, all of that with the warm, naughty & nice smile she is famous for. In some of the scenes, the video is close to the Sneaky Preview DVDs of John Cross (Hot Body). And Jennifer, with long and heavy brunette hair and a slim figure, needs some time so undress from several clothes during some photo session, but spreadeagled at last she also makes any mans dream come true.

The video quality is fine, even seen on European TVs (having 100 more lines than the US). Of course it was recorded in 4:3 ratio Standard-TV, not in HDTV. The Legal Disclaimer states the date of production being before 1995, so you should not be surprised that both girls have an only slightly trimmed dark-haired bush.

Important for all customers abroad: Despite of Amazons descriptions, all Lou Vockell DVDs (as well as all Hot Body/John Cross DVDs, all Peach DVDs and, besides, all Girls Gone Wild DVDs, too) have NO regional coding and can be used on any DVD player all over the world. Just be aware of your countrys customs regulations.
If they offered to pay me to watch this I would refuse.  Amazon should be in jail for robbing me of the money I spent on this.  What a joke, and I love Nikki Dial.
wasn't what i thought it was but a must have for nikki dial fans.
